letters.description: Establish rapport, define pregnancy milestones, and set realistic expectations for wellness goals.
Evaluate physical, emotional, nutritional, and environmental factors impacting maternal well-being.
Connect clients with relevant resources and cultivate coping mechanisms for stress management.
Collaboratively create a tailored wellness plan addressing specific needs and preferences.
Employ visualization techniques and regularly assess progress towards goals, celebrating successes.
Empower the client to advocate for their health and continuously adapt the wellness plan throughout pregnancy and postpartum.
